about_the_game:
Execute the following file to start DLC.
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Hentai Girl Seek\hentaigame\Game.exe

This DLC is a bonus mini-game.
Touch the woman's chest to increase points.
As the points accumulate, the body and expression of the woman change.
You can enjoy all three changes.
There is voice and nudity.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
